thread.title: BRIEF-IPG Photonics Q1 Earnings Per Share $1.93

title: BRIEF-IPG Photonics Q1 Earnings Per Share $1.93
text:
May 1, 2018 / 12:13 PM / Updated 9 minutes ago BRIEF-IPG Photonics Q1 Earnings Per Share $1.93 Reuters Staff
May 1 (Reuters) - IPG Photonics Corp:
* IPG PHOTONICS ANNOUNCES RECORD FIRST QUARTER 2018 FINANCIAL RESULTS * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.93
* Q1 REVENUE $359.9 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $346.3 MILLION
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.79 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* FOR Q2 OF 2018, IPG EXPECTS REVENUE OF $400 MILLION TO $430 MILLION
* FOR Q2 OF 2018, CO ANTICIPATES DELIVERING EARNINGS PER DILUTED SHARE IN RANGE OF $2.05 TO $2.35 * IPG IS NOT UPDATING ITS 2018 ANNUAL GUIDANCE
* Q2 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $2.16, REVENUE VIEW $407.5 MILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
